<title level="1" right="Rules">[Potions](/Rules.aspx?ID=3196)</title>

**Source** [GM Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=218) pg. 259 <sup>2.0</sup>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">
A potion is a magical liquid that is activated when you drink it, which uses it up. Potions have the [potion](/Traits.aspx?ID=672) trait. You can activate a potion with an [Interact](/Actions.aspx?ID=2297) action as you drink it or feed it to another creature. You can feed a potion only to a creature that is within reach and willing or otherwise so helpless that it can’t resist. You usually need only one hand to consume a potion or feed it to another creature.

[Click here for the Potions category page](/Equipment.aspx?Category=15&Subcategory=18).
</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
